titleStmt.title: The present state of the Jews (more particularly relating to those in Barbary) wherein is contained an exact account of their customs, secular and religious : to which is annexed a summary discourse of the Misna, Talmud, and Gemara / by L. Addison ...
titleStmt.author: Addison, Lancelot, 1632-1703.
